name: Iolo Evans Jones
title: Cybersecurity Specialist & Developer
bio:
I'm a cybersecurity specialist with a strong programming background, currently pursuing a master's degree in Cybersecurity With Technology (NCSC accredited) at Cardiff University. My work combines security principles with efficient development practices.


Having achieved a 1st class honors in Computer Science, I'm now focused on SOC analysis, security automation, and penetration testing. I'm actively developing my skills on TryHackMe (top 10%) while creating tools that enhance digital security.
